text: Asociación Mexicana de Productores de Fonogramas y Videogramas (AMPROFON) is a group that represents the music industry in Mexico. ==Sales certificates== Format Thresholds"Certificaciones [Certifications"] (in Spanish). AMPROFON A.C. Retrieved January 6, 2011."Top 100 Mexico: Los más vendidos [Top 100 Mexico: Bestsellers"] (in Spanish). AMPROFON A.C. Retrieved June 28, 2010.
